General.Name: S&P Syndicate Public Company Limited
General.Description: S&P Syndicate Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, operates a chain of restaurants and bakery shops. The company operates through Domestic Restaurants and Bakery Shops, Packaged Food and Bakery Trading Business, Overseas Restaurants, and Others segments. It also produces pound and packaged cakes, frozen cakes, pastries, bread and sandwiches, cookies, moon cakes, Thai desserts, and snacks; sausages under the Premo brand; frozen meal; jelio jellies; ready-made products under the Patio brand; and beverage products comprising coffee and tea bluecup, drink bottled beverages, fruit juices, smoothies, and soymilk. The company sells cookies and snacks under the S&P Delio; frozen food under the S&P Quick Meal; carrageenan jelly under the S&P Jelio; and moon cake under the Golden Dragon brand names. In addition, the company operates restaurants under the Maisen, S&P, BlueCup, Umenohana, Patara, Suda, and Vanilla brands. Further, it engages in the land transportation business; provision of food and nutrition services, and canteen operation and catering services to organizations, such as hospital, factory, and international schools; operation of cooking school under the M.S.C. Thai Culinary School name; and real estate activities. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
